title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 July 2016 - XWiki
content:
<sdumitriu1> has quit  
05:01 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
07:04 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki

11:02 <vmassol> hmm sorry I was not connected, seems my irc client has issues reconnecitng lately

11:26 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
12:46 <gdelhumeau> Trying to fix broken build by changing Jenkins options

13:22 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
13:25 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:26 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:32 <sorinello\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:35 <sorinello> has quit  
13:45 <gdelhumeau> changing the global maven settings has no effect on the agents  
13:50 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
13:56 <gdelhumeau> "xwiki-entreprise" jib has its own memory settings  
13:59 <gdelhumeau> removing them  
14:23 <vmassol> acotiuga: don't forget to document http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13519 :)  
14:32 <vmassol> seems our licenses have expired for sonar, handling it  
14:41 <vmassol> hmm the PDF test is also failing http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-misc/2591/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-misc/testReport/org.xwiki.test.misc/PDFTest/testExportSingleSimplePageAsPDF/  
14:42 <vmassol> been failing since the 29th  
14:42 <vmassol> see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-misc/  
14:42 <vmassol> so it doesn't seem to be a flicker  
14:44 <vmassol> trying locally  
14:58 <msmeria> has quit  
14:58 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:01 <msmeria> has quit  
15:07 <vmassol> I can reproduce the pdf test error  
15:08 <evalica> has quit  
15:08 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
15:08 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
15:08 <evalica1> has quit  
15:08 <vmassol> ah I know  
15:08 <vmassol> evalica: you caused the issue :)  
15:09 <vmassol> fixing  
15:09 <evalica> vmassol: sorry - I disconnected - not sure what you are talking about  
15:09 <vmassol> the PDFtest is failng  
15:09 <vmassol> been failing for a while  
15:09 <evalica> what are you fixing? I need to commit something on Support panel  
15:09 <vmassol> it's because you modified the home page  
15:09 <vmassol> but didn't modify the test  
15:09 <evalica> k - pls commit on PDFtest :) since I haven't tackled that  
15:09 <evalica> k  
15:09 <vmassol> assertTrue("Invalid content", text.contains("Welcome to your wiki"));  
15:10 <evalica> - yes also a REST test failed after the Homepage change, Edy fixed that  
15:10 <evalica> well….. the text is … Welcome to your wiki  
15:11 <evalica> it's a heading inside Main.WebHome content thu  
15:11 <vmassol> actuzally  
15:11 <vmassol> it's not the home  
15:11 <vmassol> it's Dashboard.WebHome  
15:12 <evalica> aaa.. yes - there we didn't fix it, because I didn't had a build all this time - thanks if you can fix it  
15:19 <Trefex\_> has quit  
15:29 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
15:48 <vmassol> acotiuga: I've noticed a problem with tehe tour  
15:48 <vmassol> when executing the enterprise misc tests  
15:48 <vmassol> I get:  
15:48 <acotiuga> ack  
15:49 <vmassol> https://gist.githubusercontent.com/vmassol/b1bb285266bc3437c5d8fc663aebebb5/raw/6dc2574cb224b828dec29d49498479c85ee6aacd/gistfile1.txt  
15:49 <vmassol> it happened when stopping the wiki  
15:50 <vmassol> @evalica: pdf test fixed  
15:51 <evalica> vmassol: thanks
